page.title: 20INDUSTRY-WENTHILLS. CREDITS.
page.content: Apart from farming and related industries, the only industry in the area is metal reinforcement manufacture which is based in an old lime quarry. All types of reinforcements are made, but are not added to any structures by the manufacturers. They are made to order and then are sent to different parts of the country to be added on site. They are mostly used in road construction and for large buildings. CREDITS. This survey is the work of East Hardwick Cawood's J.&I.School. Photographs - R. Donaldson Research and writing - J.Robinson, H.Milnes, J.White, T.Peacock, J.Shaw, J.Moon, P.Crewe, S.Courtney, S.Palmer, S.Webster, S.Nichols, L.Turner, A.Robbins, S.&.J.Walker, H.Kitching.
